languages.text: "Что если я скажу, что моя предшественница повинна в гибели Крудараха?"

traits.locale_text: "Что если я скажу, что моя предшественница повинна в гибели Крудараха?"

languages.text: "What if I were to say it was my predecessor who was to blame for Crudarach's demise?"
languages.original_text: "Что если я скажу, что моя предшественница повинна в гибели Крудараха?"

traits.locale_text: "What if I say it was my predecessor who is to blame for Crudarach's demise?"
"What if I say it was my predecessor who is to blame for Crudarach's demise?"
"What if I say it is my predecessor who is to blame for Crudarach's demise?"
"What if I say it is my predecessor who is to blame for Crudarach's demise?"
"What if I were to say it was my predecessor who was to blame for Crudarach's demise?"
"What if I were to say it was my predecessor who was to blame for Crudarach's demise?"

languages.text: «¿Y si os dijera que mi predecesora fue la responsable de la destrucción de Crudarach?».
languages.original_text: "What if I were to say it was my predecessor who was to blame for Crudarach's demise?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y si os dijera que mi predecesora fue la responsable de la destrucción de Crudarach?».

languages.text: “如果我说，克鲁达拉赫覆灭的罪魁祸首，就是我的前任行商浪人呢？”
languages.original_text: "What if I were to say it was my predecessor who was to blame for Crudarach's demise?"

traits.locale_text: “如果我说，克鲁达拉赫覆灭的罪魁祸首，就是我的前任行商浪人呢？”

languages.text: « Et si je vous disais que c'est ma prédécesseure qui est responsable de la fin de Crudarach ? »
languages.original_text: "What if I were to say it was my predecessor who was to blame for Crudarach's demise?"

traits.locale_text: « Et si je vous disais que c'est ma prédécesseure qui est responsable de la destruction de Crudarach ? »

languages.text: 「クルダラの死は、私の前任者のせいだと言ったらどうなる？」
languages.original_text: "What if I were to say it was my predecessor who was to blame for Crudarach's demise?"

traits.locale_text: 「クルダラの死は私の前任者のせいだと言ったらどうなる？」

languages.text: "Und wenn ich sage, dass es meine Vorgängerin war, die für Crudarachs Niedergang verantwortlich war?"
languages.original_text: "What if I were to say it was my predecessor who was to blame for Crudarach's demise?"

traits.locale_text: "Und wenn ich sage, dass es meine Vorgängerin war, die für Crudarachs Niedergang verantwortlich war?"

languages.text: "Peki ya Crudarach'ın çöküşünden selefimin sorumlu olduğunu söylesem?"
languages.original_text: "What if I were to say it was my predecessor who was to blame for Crudarach's demise?"

traits.locale_text: "Peki ya Crudarach'ın çöküşünden selefimin sorumlu olduğunu söylesem?"
